A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Difference between The Original Trilogy and this is in the quantity of characters. In the original\, every addition felt like a member of a family. Lando\, Chewie\, Han and even Leia. In this with\, Poe\, Maz\, Rose\, Purple hair\, phasma. Only one feels really like a member of the family. With more time\,I believe if we cut out a half hour of the film with severe edits\, there is a 9/10 in it.  so 7 out of 10
